Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Staphaine A. Staley
Reviews.Content: saddly this review wont help many as it is for a close out, but i like this camera so much i wanted to say somethan. I get great pic and it is light and easy to pack. i bought it for my mom and dad who are not very computer based. it is very easy to use and to make pic off of and put onto the computer. takes a normal sdhc card so cheap to get and works very nice with even a cheap class 10 card. so was a great buy all around. also has a very fair battery life.

Reviews.Title: 2nd one I've owned.
Reviews.Author: lpatton
Reviews.Content: This is the second one I have bought.  I like how fast it saves the picture to the sim card so that I can more quickly snap-snap-snap and get the shot that I want.  Important since I have active children.  My first one lasted about 2 years and then the lense wouldn't come out anymore.  IDK if that was from being knocked around or just a malfunction.  For the price and the quality of pictures, I'd be willing to purchase this camera every two years, but I hope this second one lasts longer.Wish this had come with the manual, but I can look the info up online, so not a huge deal.

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work outside, when you go outside the entire screen turns black
Reviews.Author: K. Centonzo "loves nascar"
Reviews.Content: It doesn't work outside for pictures, when you are out in the sun the screen turns black.  I don't like it at all

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: lmm
Reviews.Content: I like the size and it takes great pictures. The only drawback is that it uses batteries more quickly than other cameras I've had.

Reviews.Title: Great for first time user
Reviews.Author: Brandee Holmes "baby doll"
Reviews.Content: Not complicated very straight forward for both teen And adult first time users. Easy control flash zoom in an out and downloading to computer to share

ProductInfo.Features:
14 megapixel resolution
Kodak 27-135mm zoom lens -Features a 5x optical zoom
3.0" LCD display
VGA movie file format - Record movies in resolution up to 640 x 480 on this compact camera
16 scene modes - Kodak Share Button
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak C1450 14mp Digital Camera w/ 5x Optical Zoom - Red
